description: If you're searching for maximum cushioning in your go-to ski socks, look no further than our Ski Full Cushion Alpine Edge Socks. This pair of Merino wool socks helps keep things warm, but breathable. And comfortable, but always performance-ready. Elevate every ski day with your soon-to-be favorite socks.
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Alpine Edge Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 61% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 27% Recycled Nylon, 2% Elastane
